Key Match Events: Jordan Poole and Draymond Green had a heated exchange during the game, with Poole refusing to let Green talk to his teammate.
The two former teammates were physical with each other in the paint and showed tension throughout the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Draymond Green acknowledged Jordan Poole's improved performance, stating Poole is taking smarter shots.
Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr mentioned that the punch incident between Green and Poole in 2022 compromised the team's season.
